nodes.text: Sand wine was a type of wine. When a starship landed on the Mid Rim planet Manforgon at some point during the Galactic Civil War, a crewmember of the vessel claimed to the local Imperial Customs Officer Tellix that the starship was carrying a cargo of sand wine.
Sand wine was mentioned in the 2000 core rulebook for the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
